router().notice: BURN LIQUIDITY WITH ROUTER EXERCISE  The contract has an initial balance of 0.01 UNI-V2-LP tokens.  Burn a position (remove liquidity) from USDC/ETH pool to this contract.  The challenge is to use Uniswapv2 router to remove all the liquidity from the pool.
